content: यम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (यच्छति, ययाम, अयंसीत्, यंस्यति, यंतुं, यत; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} यियंसति) {@--1@} To check, curb, restrain, control, subdue, stop, suppress; यच्छेद्बाङ्मनसी प्रज्ञः Kaṭh; यतचित्तात्मन् <ls>Bg. 4. 21</ls>; see यत. {@--2@} To offer, give, bestow. {@--3@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To support, sustain. {@--4@} To raise, lift up. {@--5@} To extend, stretch. {@--6@} To go. {@--7@} To exhibit, show. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (यमयति-ते) To restrain, check &c.
